In addition, a number of vessels shown under ore, phosphates, lead, &u., under(4) on page 4 load outward for an Allied Government. A comparison of the numbers shown under I. and IV. for the 8 months does not therefore give an accurate criterion of the vessels in Allied service at the different periods. 1 "Eequisition " is here used to mean "requisition for full Government service." tf Includes 13 vessels (36,402 6.T.) transferred from Norwegian flag under the Norwegian Agreement. As these requireto be replaced in Norwegian service by British vessels they do not represent additional vessels available for British service.
